sentences.en: A lot of his writings inveigh against luxury and riches.
sentences.cn: 他的很多文章都痛批奢华与财富。

sentences.en: The detective had, indeed, good reasons to inveigh against the bad luck which pursued him.
sentences.cn: 说实在话, 一点也不能怪费克斯咒骂他一再碰上的坏运气.

sentences.en: The poisons generated by remorse inveigh against the system, and eventually produce marked physical deterioration.
sentences.cn: 由悔恨产生的毒素侵袭着身体组织, 最终造成明显的体质恶化.

trans.tran_en: If you inveigh against something, you criticize it strongly
